entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.9°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
